content.prompt: The outcome of the trial best illustrates which of the following?

choices.label: The protection of the rights of the gentry and aristocracy from monarchical power
The continued influence of folk ideals and superstition in criminal accusations
The enforcement of community values through rituals of public humiliation
The increasing role of city governments in enforcing public morals

topic.text: 3.2: English Civil War and the Glorious Revolution

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
